resources.string: Password must contain at least 6 characters
You can find the item in your backpack.
You can use Plants in combination with a Scrollidge to gain more experience (xp)
You can use Flames in combination with a Scrollipow to gain more combat points (cp)
You can use 4 Trombuluses in combination with a Scrollifly to conjure up a Travelwind
You can use Waterdrops in combination with an Ancient Scrollifix to restore your health (hp)
The Healing Scrollifix lets you restore your hp. The cost is 4 waterdrops and the Scrollifix itself.
The Mighty Scrollifix lets you increase your cp. The cost is 4 flames and the Scrollipow itself.
The Swift Scrollifly lets you create a Travelwind so you can travel to distant areas of Wanderful World. The cost to create a Travelwind is 4 Trombuluses and the Scrollifly itself.
The Ancient Scrollidge lets you increase your xp. The cost is 4 plants and the Scrollidge itself.
The Healing Potion lets you regain hp during a fight. Use it wisely since it will be consumed and removed from your backpack.
The Combat Potion lets you increase your combat power during a fight. Use it wisely since it will be consumed and removed from your backpack.
The Travelwind lets you travel to a distant place in Wanderful World. Use it wisely since it will be consumed and removed from your backpack.

Greetings young apprentice. If you manage to bring back 5 artefacts you are accepted. A hint: You can find the artefacts in different areas of the Wanderful World. Pick up things on the map, use scrolls in your backpack and use 2 fingers to rotate/zoom on the map.
Hold down Trashcan if you want to remove the item
